person_attribute_type.name: Care giver's Name
person_attribute_type.description: Care givers name to the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Care giver's Telephone Number
person_attribute_type.description: The telephone number of the person giving care

person_attribute_type.name: Common Name
person_attribute_type.description: This is the widely used name when referring to the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Land Mark Feature
person_attribute_type.description: This is an easily visible feature when looking for the location of the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Directions to Patient's Home
person_attribute_type.description: Detailed description of how one can get to the location of the patient
